citations.narrative:
There were no current records listing the date and name of the last deworming treatments that the adult dogs received.
Licensee stated that he follows a deworming schedule for the male and female adult dogs, but that he did not have a
current list of deworming treatments. Failure to record the dates and names of all treatments makes it difficult to access
whether the written program of veterinary care is being followed as prescribed by the attending veterinarian and that dogs
are receiving preventative care to prevent health risks. Correct by March 3, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
There were no current records listing the date and name of the last deworming treatments that the adult dogs received. 
Licensee stated that he follows a deworming schedule for the male and female adult dogs, but that he did not have a 
current list of deworming treatments. Failure to record the dates and names of all treatments makes it difficult to access 
whether the written program of veterinary care is being followed as prescribed by the attending veterinarian and that dogs 
are receiving preventative care to prevent health risks. Correct by March 3, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
